column4: hey guys i want to do a fresh install on my windows/ubuntu machine about how long ya think it will take? what i plan to do is simply reformat the ubuntu partition (9gb of info on it...) and reinstall the ubuntu os
depending on how fast your disk/CD are. Something like 30-40 minutes is typical.
'mkisofs' usually or one of its several GUI frontends.
look at the log, not the config file, it will tel you... /var/log/Xorg.0.log
